product_desc:
SnapCart is a hardware device and software platform that gives all the information a shopper needs at their fingertips in a grocery store.

We team with large and small grocery chains to physically retrofits their shopping carts with this device to provide a more enjoyable customer experience. It displays daily sales offerings, recommended recipes, product reviews, nutritional information of products, integrates a user’s shopping list, provides product location / search, and your optimal path via accurate in-store navigation.

We generate tons of user and store data with each trip, including 1000’s of real-time images of the inside of a store. We use Computer Vision and AI algorithms to provide important alerts to grocers and CPGs.

The platform is designed to solve multiple billion dollar problems for shoppers, grocers and CPG’s, from the empty shelf problem, to planogram compliance, to generating actionable customer data and insights.
name: SnapCart
